001// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later
002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tppstopwordfiltering;
004
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Map.Entry;
008import java.util.Set;
009
010import javax.json.JsonObject;
011import javax.json.stream.JsonGenerator;
012
013import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.abstracttppstep.AbstractTppProcessingStep;
014import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.abstracttppstep.JsonResponseAttributeType;
015import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.abstracttppstep.ProcessingBiConsumer;
016import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.ProcessingException;
017import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tppstopwordfiltering.entity.StopwordFilteredTextDocument;
018import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tppstopwordfiltering.entity.StopwordFilteredTextWithTitleDocument;
019import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tppstopwordfiltering.xml.definition.LanguageProcessingStepParameter;
020import lombok.AccessLevel;
021import lombok.NoArgsConstructor;
022import lombok.NonNull;
023import lombok.Setter;
024
025/**
026 * Removes stopwords from documents, using Text Processing Python.
027 * <p>
028 * In the reference implementation of Text Processing Python, this step
029 * normalizes multiple spaces to a single space, and uses NLTK stopword lists.
030 * </p>
031 * <p>
032 * Example declaration for this step in a process definition file:
033 * </p>
034 * <pre>
035 * {@code <step action="TppStopwordFiltering">
036 *      <parameters>
037 *              <tpp:endpoint>http://127.0.0.1:5005/tpp/v1/remove-stopwords</tpp:endpoint>
038 *              <textDocumentWithTitleTableName>tokenized_submission</textDocumentWithTitleTableName>
039 *              <textDocumentTableName>tokenized_comment</textDocumentTableName>
040 *              <tppsf:language>english</tppsf:language>
041 *      </parameters>
042 * </step>}
043 * </pre>
044 *
045 * @author Alejandro González García
046 */
047final class TppStopwordFilteringProcessingStep extends AbstractTppProcessingStep {
048        private static final String LANGUAGE_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME = new LanguageProcessingStepParameter().getName();
049
050        /**
051         * Instantiates a Text Processing Python stopword filtering processing step.
052         *
053         * @param requestParametersAction The action to use to add the language
054         *                                parameter to the request.
055         * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the parameter is {@code null}.
056         */
057        public TppStopwordFilteringProcessingStep(@NonNull final AddLanguageParameterAction requestParametersAction) {
058                super(
059                        // Additional mandatory and optional parameters, with their validation function
060                        Map.of(
061                                LANGUAGE_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME, (final String value) -> value != null && !value.isBlank()
062                        ),
063                        // Additional mandatory parameters
064                        Set.of(LANGUAGE_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME),
065                        // Result entity types
066                        List.of(StopwordFilteredTextWithTitleDocument.class, StopwordFilteredTextDocument.class),
067                        // Step description format string
068                        "Removing %s stopwords",
069                        // JSON response attribute type
070                        JsonResponseAttributeType.STRING,
071                        // Request parameters action
072                        requestParametersAction,
073                        // Attribute store action
074                        new FilteredAttributeStoreAction()
075                );
076        }
077
078        /**
079         * Adds the stopword filtering algorithm parameters to the generated JSON
080         * request.
081         *
082         * @author Alejandro González García
083         */
084        @NoArgsConstructor(access = AccessLevel.PACKAGE)
085        static final class AddLanguageParameterAction implements ProcessingConsumer<JsonGenerator> {
086                @NonNull @Setter(AccessLevel.PACKAGE)
087                private TppStopwordFilteringProcessingStep step;
088
089                @Override
090                public void accept(final JsonGenerator requestJsonGenerator) throws ProcessingException {
091                        try {
092                                requestJsonGenerator
093                                        .writeStartObject("parameters")
094                                                .write("language", step.getParameters().get(LANGUAGE_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME))
095                                        .writeEnd();
096                        } catch (final Exception exc) {
097                                throw new ProcessingException(
098                                        "An exception occurred while adding parameters to a request", exc
099                                );
100                        }
101                }
102        }
103
104        /**
105         * Parses a stopword filtered document attribute from the corresponding Text
106         * Processing Python JSON response object into a map.
107         *
108         * @author Alejandro González García
109         */
110        private static final class FilteredAttributeStoreAction implements ProcessingBiConsumer<Entry<String, JsonObject>, Map<String, String>> {
111                @Override
112                public void accept(
113                        final Entry<String, JsonObject> returnedAttributeObject, final Map<String, String> processedAttributesMap
114                ) throws ProcessingException {
115                        try {
116                                processedAttributesMap.put(
117                                        returnedAttributeObject.getKey(), returnedAttributeObject.getValue().getString("text")
118                                );
119                        } catch (final Exception exc) {
120                                throw new ProcessingException(
121                                        "An exception occurred while processing the stopword filtered document", exc
122                                );
123                        }
124                }
125        }
126}
